actions.title: Smart Scraper

actions.description: Start a new web crawl request with AI extraction or markdown conversion.
actions.name: startCrawl

properties.description: Unique identifier for the crawl task. Use this task_id to retrieve the crawl result.
properties.name: task_id

properties.description: Unique identifier for the crawl task. Use this task_id to retrieve the crawl result.
properties.name: task_id

properties.description: The starting URL for the crawl.
properties.label: URL
properties.name: url

properties.description: Instructions for data extraction. Required when extraction_mode is true.
properties.label: Prompt
properties.name: prompt

properties.description: When false, enables markdown conversion mode (NO AI/LLM processing, 2 credits per page). Default is true.
properties.label: Extraction Mode
properties.name: extraction_mode

properties.description: Whether to cache the website content.
properties.label: Cache Website
properties.name: cache_website

properties.description: Maximum crawl depth.
properties.label: Depth
properties.name: depth

properties.description: Maximum number of pages to crawl.
properties.label: Max Pages
properties.name: max_pages

properties.description: Whether to crawl only the same domain.
properties.label: Same Domain Only
properties.name: same_domain_only

properties.description: Number of pages to process in each batch.
properties.label: Batch Size
properties.name: batch_size

properties.description: JSON Schema object for structured output.
properties.label: Schema
properties.name: schema

properties.description: Crawl rules for filtering URLs.
properties.label: Rules
properties.name: rules

properties.description: List of URL patterns (regex) to exclude from crawling. Matches full URL.

items.description: List of URL patterns (regex) to exclude from crawling. Matches full URL.

properties.label: Exclude
properties.name: exclude

properties.description: List of path patterns to include (e.g., ['/products/*', '/blog/**']). Supports wildcards: * matches any characters, ** matches any path segments. If empty or not specified, all paths are included.

items.description: List of path patterns to include (e.g., ['/products/*', '/blog/**']). Supports wildcards: * matches any characters, ** matches any path segments. If empty or not specified, all paths are included.

properties.label: Include Paths
properties.name: include_paths

properties.description: List of path patterns to exclude (e.g., ['/admin/*', '/api/**']). Supports wildcards: * matches any characters, ** matches any path segments. Takes precedence over include_paths. If empty or not specified, no paths are excluded.

items.description: List of path patterns to exclude (e.g., ['/admin/*', '/api/**']). Supports wildcards: * matches any characters, ** matches any path segments. Takes precedence over include_paths. If empty or not specified, no paths are excluded.

properties.label: Exclude Paths
properties.name: exclude_paths

properties.description: Restrict crawling to same domain.
properties.label: Same Domain
properties.name: same_domain

properties.description: Use sitemap.xml for discovery.
properties.label: Sitemap
properties.name: sitemap

properties.description: Enable heavy JavaScript rendering.
properties.label: Render Heavy JS
properties.name: render_heavy_js

properties.description: Enable stealth mode to bypass bot protection using advanced anti-detection techniques. Adds +4 credits to the request cost.
properties.label: Stealth
properties.name: stealth

actions.title: Start SmartCrawler

actions.description: Get the status and results of a previous smartcrawl request.
actions.name: getCrawlStatus

properties.description: Overall status of the request.
properties.name: status

properties.description: The crawl job result.
properties.name: result

properties.description: Status of the crawl job (e.g., 'done', 'processing', 'failed').
properties.name: status

properties.description: The extracted data from the crawled pages, structured according to the provided schema.
properties.name: llm_result

properties.description: List of URLs that were crawled.

items.description: List of URLs that were crawled.

properties.name: crawled_urls

properties.description: List of crawled pages with their markdown content.

items.description: List of crawled pages with their markdown content.

properties.description: The URL of the crawled page.
properties.name: url

properties.description: The markdown content of the page.
properties.name: markdown

description: ScrapeGraphAI is a web scraping python library that uses LLM and direct graph logic to create scraping pipelines for websites and local documents.
name: scrapeGraphAi
title: ScrapeGraphAI
